thread.title: Alcatel Flash launches Flash 2 in India
thread.title_full: Alcatel Flash launches Flash 2 in India

author: Deccan
title: Alcatel Flash launches Flash 2 in India
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 20, 2015, 18.04 The new Alacatel Flash 2 New Delhi: Alcatel Flash has launched its latest flagship model, the Alcatel Flash 2, at an even held in New Delhi on Tuesday. The Alcatel Flash 2 sports a 5-inch IPS LCD HD display (720x1280 pixels) with 5-point multi-touch capacitive touch screen.
The device is powered by a 64-bit octacore 1.3Ghz Cortex-A53 MT6753 processor along with 2GB RAM. The smartphone has 16GB internal storage and can be extended up to 128GB. In terms of software, the Alacatel Flash 2 runs on an Android 5.1 (lollipop) interface.
Moreover, the company claims Flash 2 will deliver robust performance and is ideal for power-hungry users. The device also features a Mali-T720MP4 GPU for peak graphic performance.
Moving on to the camera, the Flash 2 sports 13MP f/2.0 rear camera sensor for sharper and clearer pictures. The camera is accompanied by RealTone dual flash providing significant advantage in low light conditions.
The 5MP front shooter comes equipped with a lot of exciting features along with flash for clicking good selfies in low light conditions.
The handset will be sold in association with Flipkart at Rs 9,299 and the product will be available on the website starting next week. It will be available in volcanic Grey colour.
